mapper.select: SELECT ui.id, ui.user_name AS userName, ui.gender, li.mobile_number AS phoneNumber, ui.email, ui.avatar, ui.nickname, ui.crm_open_id AS crmOpenId, ui.scrm_open_id AS scrmOpenId, li.last_check_sms AS lastCheckSms, ssi.comp_id AS companyId, ssi.id AS staffId, urs.role_id AS roleId, usd.department_id AS deptId, sdi.depart_name AS deptName FROM sys_user_info ui JOIN ( SELECT user_id, user_pwd, last_check_sms, mobile_number FROM sys_login_info WHERE login_name = #{userName} and status = 0 UNION SELECT user_id, user_pwd, last_check_sms, mobile_number FROM sys_login_info WHERE mobile_number = #{userName} and status = 0 ) li ON ui.id = li.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_staff_info ssi ON ssi.user_id = ui.id and ssi.`status` in (0, 3) LEFT JOIN union_staff_depart usd ON usd.staff_id = ssi.id LEFT JOIN union_role_staff urs ON urs.staff_id = ssi.id LEFT JOIN sys_department_info sdi ON usd.department_id = sdi.id WHERE ui.STATUS in (0, 3) limit 1

SELECT li.user_pwd AS userPwd, ssi.id AS staffId, ui.id AS userId FROM sys_user_info ui JOIN ( SELECT user_pwd, user_id FROM sys_login_info WHERE login_name = #{userName} and status = 0 UNION SELECT user_pwd, user_id FROM sys_login_info WHERE mobile_number = #{userName} and status = 0 ) li ON ui.id = li.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_staff_info ssi ON ssi.user_id = ui.id WHERE ui.STATUS in (0, 3) limit 1
SELECT count(1) > 0 FROM sys_user_info WHERE phone_number = #{phoneNumber} and `status` in (0, 3)

SELECT sci.company_name AS companyName, ssi.id AS staffId, ssi.STATUS AS status, sui.user_name AS userName, sui.phone_number AS phoneNumber, sui.email AS email, sui.avatar AS avatar, sdi.id AS departId, sdi.depart_name AS departName, sjp.id AS positionId, sui.id_card_front AS idCardFront, sjp.position_name AS positionName, sui.is_prepare_executive FROM sys_user_info sui LEFT JOIN sys_staff_info ssi ON sui.id = ssi.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_company_info sci ON ssi.comp_id = sci.id LEFT JOIN union_staff_depart usd ON usd.staff_id = ssi.id LEFT JOIN sys_department_info sdi ON usd.department_id = sdi.id LEFT JOIN union_staff_position usp ON usp.staff_id = ssi.id LEFT JOIN sys_job_position sjp ON sjp.id = usp.position_id WHERE sui.`status` in (0, 3) AND sui.id = #{id}

SELECT ui.id, ui.user_name AS userName, ui.gender, li.mobile_number AS phoneNumber, li.user_pwd AS userPwd, ui.email, ui.avatar, ui.nickname, ui.crm_open_id AS crmOpenId, ui.scrm_open_id AS scrmOpenId, li.last_check_sms AS lastCheckSms, ssi.comp_id AS companyId, ssi.user_type AS userType, ssi.id AS staffId, urs.role_id AS roleId, usd.department_id AS deptId, sci.company_name AS companyName, sdi.depart_name AS deptName FROM sys_user_info ui JOIN sys_login_info li ON ui.id = li.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_staff_info ssi ON ssi.user_id = ui.id and ssi.`status` in (0, 3) LEFT JOIN union_staff_depart usd ON usd.staff_id = ssi.id LEFT JOIN union_role_staff urs ON urs.staff_id = ssi.id LEFT JOIN sys_department_info sdi ON usd.department_id = sdi.id LEFT JOIN sys_company_info sci ON ssi.comp_id = sci.id WHERE ui.STATUS in (0, 3) AND ui.id = #{userId} limit 1
SELECT id from sys_user_info WHERE STATUS IN (0, 3) UNION SELECT id from ceo_user_info WHERE deleted = 0 AND STATUS = 0

SELECT sui.id AS id, ssi.comp_id AS compId, ssi.user_name AS userName, sci.company_name AS companyName, sui.phone_number AS phone, sjp.position_name AS positionName, sdi.depart_name AS departName, ssi.id AS staffId, urs.role_name AS roleName, sui.status AS staffStatus, ssi.evaluate, ssi.resume_url FROM sys_user_info sui JOIN sys_staff_info ssi ON sui.id = ssi.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_company_info sci ON sci.id = ssi.comp_id LEFT JOIN union_role_staff urs ON urs.staff_id = ssi.id LEFT JOIN union_staff_depart usd ON usd.staff_id = ssi.id LEFT JOIN sys_department_info sdi ON usd.department_id = sdi.id and sdi.status = 0 LEFT JOIN union_staff_position usp ON usp.staff_id = ssi.id LEFT JOIN sys_job_position sjp ON sjp.id = usp.position_id and sjp.status = 0 where sui.status IN (0, 3)

SELECT sui.id AS user_id, ssi.comp_id AS company_id, ssi.user_name AS user_name, sci.company_name AS company_name, sui.phone_number AS phone, sdi.depart_name AS depart_name, ssi.id AS staff_id, sui.status, sdi.id AS `depart_id`, ssi.evaluate, ssi.user_type, ssi.resume_url, sui.create_time FROM sys_user_info sui JOIN sys_staff_info ssi ON sui.id = ssi.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_company_info sci ON sci.id = ssi.comp_id LEFT JOIN union_staff_depart usd ON usd.staff_id = ssi.id LEFT JOIN sys_department_info sdi ON usd.department_id = sdi.id and sdi.status = 0 where sui.status IN (0, 3)

select sui.id as 'userId', sui.user_name as 'userName', sui.avatar, ca.company_id as 'companyId', sdi.id 'departmentId', sdi.parent_id as 'parentId', year(NOW()) - year(IFNULL(ssi.date_join,ssi.create_time)) as num from sys_user_info sui left join sys_staff_info ssi on sui.id = ssi.user_id left join company_admin ca on ca.staff_id = ssi.id left join sys_department_info sdi on sdi.admin_account = ssi.id where sui.status in (0,3) AND ( DATE_FORMAT(ssi.date_join,'%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%m-%d') or (ssi.date_join is null and DATE_FORMAT(ssi.create_time,'%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%m-%d') ))
